item.title: Doc Was Wrong About Time Travel In Back To The Future And This Throwaway Line Proves It
item.description: Doc Brown's decision to repair the letter in Back to the Future might have been because he realized he was wrong about the way that time travel works.

item.title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day Movie Title Explained - Controversial Marvel Comics Story Inspiration And What It Means For MCU Peter Parker
item.description: Sony has revealed the official title for the fourth MCU Spider-Man movie, inspired by one of the most controversial comics stories of all time.

item.title: Why Spider-Man: Beyond The Spider-Verse Isn't Releasing Until 2027
item.description: Sony's Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse will be released more than four years after its original release date due to a variety of factors.
